projects.title: PDX Flix
projects.description: I find most movie showtimes websites to be full of adverts and noise, and doesn't reflect the boutique theater culture of Portland.

projects.title: Asylum Arts
projects.description: Asylum Arts supports contemporary Jewish culture on an international scale, bringing greater exposure to artists and cultural initiatives and providing opportunities for new projects and collaborations.

projects.title: Whisperer (Google)
projects.description: This tool is used by Google's internal Marketing department to manage a database of client 'stories' that is used in conjunction with CRM tools.

projects.title: Whisperer v2 (Google)
projects.description: This tool is used by Google's internal Marketing department to manage a database of client 'stories' that is used in conjunction with CRM tools.

projects.title: Abacus (Google)
projects.description: This tool was used by companies wishing to view metrics reagarding their internal Google online tools usage (e.g. Docs, Sheeets).

projects.title: Diva (Google)
projects.description: This was an inventory tool for retail.  It used RFID tracking of merchandise to accurately track inventory in-store or remote.

projects.title: The Hilt
projects.description: The Hilt is a popular bar on Alberta St. in Portland, Oregon.

projects.title: Mancala
projects.description: An attempt to port my college Artificial Intelligence project from C++ to JS.

projects.title: North American Repower
projects.description: NAR develops diesel-to-natural gas conversion kits for semi trucks. I built an installer system that allows secure installation records and for the EPA to search for vehicle history by VIN.

projects.title: O/M Studio
projects.description: O/M is a design studio based in San Francisco.

projects.title: Slide Viewer
